name: Fredrik Montelin
obverse: Bust of Fredrik Montelin facing left.
reverse: Inscription in 11 lines. At the bottom is a castle representing Lund's coat of arms.
reverse_inscriptions: GENOM·INITIATIVRIKEDOM KLOKHET·OCH·OEGENNYTTA I·SIN·MÅNGÅRIGA·SAMHÄLLELIGA GÄRNING·HAR·HAN·VARIT SIN·FÄDERNESTAD TILL·OVÄRDERLIGT·GAGN
description: Fredrik Montelin was a Swedish pharmacist and politician from Lund.
